wikipedia_page.main: Brigadier-General Guy Melfort Baldwin  (22 March 1865 – 22 March 1945) was a British cavalry officer in the British Indian Army  where he commanded the 25th Cavalry (Frontier Force) and later the Derajat Brigade.

response: *Commander Major General George Younghusband. He was succeeded by Brigadier-General Francis John Fowler. By 1917 the commander was Brigadier-General Guy Melfort Baldwin.
